Несмотря на то, что игра является представителем хоррор жанра, здесь вы не будете испытывать страха, скорее будет азарт (а ещё частые всплески негативных высказываний, если вы эмоциональный человек, как я ^-^) Как и в любой онлайн игре, здесь есть проблемы с серверами, что довольно нередко будет доставлять вам неудобства, если вы из русского комьюнити. Dbd по-своему интересна и регулярно имеет обновления (за что разработчикам спасибо, хотя стоило бы устранить старые ошибки, прежде чем вводить что-то новое). Если решите в неё поиграть, просто наберитесь терпения и тогда, возможно, она привлечёт ваше внимание больше, чем просто очередная игрушка, чтобы убить время. Удачи!

(평균 살인마는 2~10분 잡아야함 시간대별로 차이가 있음, 생존자는 평균 5분 이하)

적응 한다면 헤어나오기 쉽지 않은 게임, 무엇보다 친구들과 함께 한다면 금상첨화

Dead by Daylight aka Looping by Daylight is the modern day "ring a round a rosie" for adults with a twist. Players must take turns running in circles using pallets and bodyblocking other survivors to your advantage, whilst completing side objectives like helping teammates. Players face difficult challenges along the way such as: face camping bubbas, clauds who self-care for 10mins to not take a hit for you, people who dc after my 15min queue and sweaty nurse mains. 

Community is 90% friendly and genuinely nice. Game is a lot of fun, especially if you SWF :'(.

Great game! Even better with friends! Totally recommend! I've been eyeing up this game for quite some time. Finally got it while on sale. One of the best sale items I ever got. You don't necessarily need friends to play it as you can play public matches with randoms, but with friends on custom matches is extremely fun!

When I first started playing this game I found it extremely fun and had a lot of high hopes for it, it had a lot of potential. After putting considerable time into it and watching its progression in the last couple years I can tell that any potential it had has been wasted.

It has become very clear that any bugs or problems go ignored in favor of trying to cover it up with new content or features that only further break the game. Even with public player surveys it feels like any real problem with the game is completely brushed off, even "fixes" for them don't truly fix them.

This game has far surpassed the excuse of being indie or not having the means to truly fix and polish the game with its exploding popularity and expansion.  I hope that the team finally pulls up their pants and fixes the things we've been asking them to fix for years but until then I personally wouldn't recommend wasting your money.

Besides the occasional rude killer, babysitter, and troll (which are all found in any online game, and this game has a rating system so you can get them in trouble) this game is an incredible amount of fun.  I play with a friend of mine, we have a lot of fun white knuckling away at tasks that take way longer than you want them to and shrieking in horror as we're bodily dragged to be hung on meat hooks! Great fun!!

O jogo VALE O SEU TEMPO.
Dead by Daylight sempre me atraiu muito, por conta da temática inovadora e design/conceito de personagens (Killers e Survivors) incríveis. Quando finalmente pude comprar o jogo, eu não me arrependi nem um pouco, ele era mais do que eu esperava que fosse. Dead by Daylight é um jogo com uma premissa simples, que, com suas modificações (vantagens de sobreviventes e assassinos, oferendas e addons), muda completamente cada partida que você entra. É definitivamente meu jogo preferido. Ideal pra quem está acostumado com jogos online, com meta e builds, LoL como exemplo.
Minhas únicas críticas são ao balanceamento e a comunidade, tóxica além do normal. O balanceamento que eu digo é o matchmaking em si, comigo jogando faz 1 mês e caindo com pessoas de rank altíssimos. Eu não sou um ótimo killer, mas eu jogo bem, mas tenho certeza que não ao ponto de cair com rankings tão altos. E aos preços também, eu acho que para as poucas coisas que o jogo adiciona como DLC, é muito preço. Mas estou completamente satisfeito com o jogo e pretendo jogar muito ainda.
